trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around September 30th 2009
Summary: Witness and wife were traveling in car and saw an unidentifiable light cross diagonally from left to right in front of them.
divs: sighting detailswas wondering if you have any reports like this one that i will tell you about. my wife and i were just north of washington, iowa driving south at night when my wife noticed a light to left in the sky flying at a low altitude. clear night about 8 pm and moving fast. the only light we did see was a white strobe light going back and forth on the back of the craft. it reminded us of the show that had the car kit, i think, with the red light going back and forth. this light appeared to be on the back, but who knows as it was dark. i guess it to be about 50 feet wide for the light going back and forth from one side to the other. it was headed southeast. could not really make out any shape but we did not hear any sound as of a jet or small plane as it flew over us. we were going to put the date down but forgot to do it. it was last fall when this happened. [cms\tg\pid]
